short_summary: Fabrication and assembly of PCB assemblies for National Research Council Canada
description: The National Research Council Canada has a requirement for the fabrication and assembly of various PCB assemblies. Task Authorizations will be issued on an "as and when requested basis...
full_summary:
## Printed Circuit Board Assembly Tender
### Notice #18621915

#### Overview
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Printed Circuit Board (PCB) assemblies. The procurement process involves the fabrication and assembly of various PCBs, as well as testing and delivery to NRC's Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics sites in Penticton and Victoria, British Columbia.

#### Procurement Details
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** None
*   **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End-User Entity:** National Research Council of Canada (NRC)

#### Project Timeline
*   **Publication Date:** January 25, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 14, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** November 27, 2026
*   **Project Deadlines:** All project submissions must be received on or before the tender closing date.

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions or require clarification on this RFP, please contact the following:
*   **Contact Name:** Shaylan Stein (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** <shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18621915?extsite=MTg2MjE5MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Submission Guidelines
All solicitations must be submitted electronically through the designated portal. Late submissions will not be accepted. It is the sole responsibility of the bidder to ensure timely and accurate submission of their proposal. You must view the full notice at the designated notice URL above for all details before applying.

By following these guidelines and instructions, you can submit a well-prepared and competitive proposal for this RFP. For additional questions or clarification, please do not hesitate to reach out to the contact information above.

Seek us out to achieve more accessible contract content. Traditionally, writing style used by companies may be unclear or preachy. Translation Dropouts is here
